summary: The user requested a meta-cognition system to prioritize parallel and batch processing over sequential actions. The assistant implemented a 'Performance Protocol' utilizing hooks and rewards, subsequently enhancing it to leverage subagents for independent parallel work contexts.
current_topic: Performance Protocol and Parallel Processing Optimization
key_decisions: Implemented a meta-cognition check to identify opportunities for batch or parallel tasks
Created hooks and reward mechanisms to enforce the new Performance Protocol
Integrated subagents as a specific method for achieving parallel context execution
